member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.FuzzyMatcher
member.summary: Utility class for fuzzy matching book titles and authors.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.FuzzyMatcher.SpecialCharsPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^\\w\\s]
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [^\w\s].

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.FuzzyMatcher.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.FuzzyMatcher.IsMatch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if two strings match within the threshold.
member.returns: True if the strings match, false otherwise.

member.summary: Gets a match score for a search result.
member.returns: A match score from 0-100.

member.summary: Gets a match score including author information.
member.returns: A match score from 0-100.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.FuzzyMatcher.NormalizeForMatching(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes a string for matching.
member.returns: The normalized string.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor
member.summary: Utility class for extracting and validating ISBNs from filenames and metadata.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.Isbn13Pattern
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(?:ISBN[-\\s]?13?[-:\\s]?)?(?<isbn>97[89][-\\s]?\\d{1,5}[-\\s]?\\d{1,7}[-\\s]?\\d{1,6}[-\\s]?\\d)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a character in the set [Ii].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss].
○ Match a character in the set [Bb].
○ Match a character in the set [Nn].
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] atomically, optionally.
○ Match '1'.
○ Match '3' greedily, optionally.
○ Match a character in the set [-:\s] atomically, optionally.
○ "isbn" capture group.
○ Match the string "97".
○ Match a character in the set [89].
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 1 and at most 5 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 1 and at most 7 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 1 and at most 6 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.Isbn10Pattern
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(?:ISBN[-\\s]?10?[-:\\s]?)?(?<isbn>\\d{1,5}[-\\s]?\\d{1,7}[-\\s]?\\d{1,6}[-\\s]?[\\dX])
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a character in the set [Ii].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss].
○ Match a character in the set [Bb].
○ Match a character in the set [Nn].
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] atomically, optionally.
○ Match '1'.
○ Match '0' greedily, optionally.
○ Match a character in the set [-:\s] greedily, optionally.
○ "isbn" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 1 and at most 5 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 1 and at most 7 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 1 and at most 6 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\s] greedily, optionally.
○ Match a character in the set [Xx\d].

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.NormalizationPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[-\\s]
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [-\s].

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.ExtractFromFilename(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts an ISBN from a filename.
member.returns: The extracted ISBN or null if not found.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.NormalizeISBN(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes an ISBN by removing hyphens and spaces.
member.returns: The normalized ISBN.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.ValidateISBN13(System.String)
member.summary: Validates an ISBN-13 using the checksum algorithm.
member.returns: True if valid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.ValidateISBN10(System.String)
member.summary: Validates an ISBN-10 using the modulo 11 algorithm.
member.returns: True if valid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.BookMetadata.Utils.ISBNExtractor.ConvertISBN10ToISBN13(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an ISBN-10 to ISBN-13.
member.returns: The ISBN-13 or null if invalid.
